question: Who is the successor of General Bipin Rawat as new Chief of the Army Staff (COAS)?
explanation: Lieutenant General Manoj Mukund Naravane will be the  28th Chief of Army Staff of the Indian Army. The current Army Chief Gen Bipin Rawat will be retiring on 31 December after a period of three-years. Bipin Rawat is expected to be appointed as India\'s first Chief of Defence Staff.
